DOC.brief_summary: This study assesses the maximum tolerated dose, overall safety and antitumor activity of SU011248 in combination with gemcitabine in patients with advanced solid tumors
DOC.brief_title: A Study To Find The Best Doses Of SU011248 And Gemcitabine When Given Together To Patients With Advanced Solid Tumors
DOC.criteria: Patients with diagnosis of a solid cancer which is not responsive to standard therapy or for which no standard therapy exists Patient has good performance status (ECOG 0 or 1) Prior treatment with either gemcitabine or SU011248 Hypertension that cannot be controlled by medications
DOC.keyword: solid tumor malignancy, SU011248, sunitinib, neoplasms
